comments.body:
I believe its currently top-left to bottom-right no matter of direction? 
https://github.com/flutter/engine/pull/4540/files#diff-be56efcdd49538955ac6ed238eda9ed2R447
Yes, but as soon as I move the geometry stuff to the framework side, it will be upper-start-to-lower-end.  Should I instead update this comment when that lands?
Oh nice! So in a11y mode you have two ways to manipulate the number: either use decrease/increase actions or click the up/down button!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +157,161 @@      child: new Center(
        child: new Semantics(
          onDecrease: onDecrease,
          onIncrease: onIncrease,
          value: stringValue,
